content: Songwriters and recording artists are entitled to payment for reproductions and performances of their music. However, they do not have complete control over their music, as demonstrated by Taylor Swift's music being available on Spotify through a cover version despite her withdrawal. Taylor Swift can withdraw her recorded music from Spotify, but cannot control how the service uses cover versions of her songs by other artists. Ms. Swift can remove her own music from Spotify, but cannot control how the service uses cover versions of her songs by other artists.
